title: Saturday Matinee: The History of Vikings
description:
In this debut weekend episode, we're bringing you something fascinating from history, and hopefully introduce you to a new podcast, too. In this selection from the podcast The History of Vikings, host Noah Tetzner speaks with author Martyn Whittock about Norse mythology, but most specifically its place in Viking culture—and why it fascinates our culture today.

Link to The History of Viking: https://pod.link/1363609926
